customerRequest.title: customerRequest
customerRequest.description: if customer asks for an update in request maybe for car update or time change include that information here

updationRequest.title: updationRequest
updationRequest.description: send cancel or re-schedule as value for this variable if the customer is looking to cancel booking send cancel and if customer is looking for schedule change say re-schedule
